snippet: Despite 21st-century conveniences like GPS devices, Walden Pond, Henry David Thoreau’s idyllic retreat in the woods of Concord, Mass., remains hard to find.
abstract: Walden Pond, Henry David Thoreau’s idyllic retreat in the woods of Concord, Mass, remains hard to find, despite 21st-century navigational conveniences; Google maps and some GPS devices have been leading a number of travelers to the wrong Walden: an identically named reservoir, next to a golf course, in Lynn.
lead_paragraph: Despite 21st-century conveniences like GPS devices, Walden Pond, Henry David Thoreau’s idyllic retreat in the woods of Concord, Mass., remains hard to find.

headline.seo: Walden Pond, Thoreau’s Retreat in Concord, Is Often Hard to Find
headline.main: Where’s Walden? GPS Often Doesn’t Know
headline.print_headline: Where’s Walden? GPS Often Doesn’t Know
